Commentary: Mohammad Amir to Kamran Akmal, FOUR, pitched up - too full - attached with width outside off, Kamran leans into it and square-drives it. The ball skips away to the boundary
Mohammad Amir to Kamran Akmal, FOUR, back-to-back boundaries! Good length and slanting away outside off, Kamran employs finesse. Opens the bat-face and glides it past lone slip
Mohammad Amir to Kamran Akmal, no run, full inswinger from Amir, Kamran, who is hanging back, squirts an inside edge onto the pad. The ball rolls away square on the leg side
Mohammad Amir to Kamran Akmal, 1 run, back of a length, this simply goes away outside off with the angle. Slashed down to deep third man for one
Mohammad Amir to Malan, no run, length and outside off, 144.2ks, jabbed towards backward point
Mohammad Amir to Malan, 1 run, skiddy back-of-a-length delivery around off, Malan is pinned on the backfoot as he dabs a single down to third man
Imad Wasim to Malan, no run, pushed through and slides away outside off, past the outside edge
Imad Wasim to Malan, FOUR, fired outside off at nearly 94ks, Malan presses forward and creams a drive in the gap at the covers. The ball is coming onto the bat nicely
Imad Wasim to Malan, no run, tossed up, played back to the bowler
Imad Wasim to Malan, no run, back of a length and rolls on outside off, Malan stands tall and punches to mid-off
Imad Wasim to Malan, FOUR, Wasim errs short and outside off, Malan belts it away between the covers and point for the second boundary of the over
Imad Wasim to Malan, no run, quick fizzer on middle and leg - no room - blocked back to Wasim
Sohail Khan to Kamran Akmal, no run, Kamran weathers an lbw appeal. Back of a length, skids on quickly and raps the back thigh, well above the knee-roll. Kamran plays across the line and misses
Sohail Khan to Kamran Akmal, no run, full awayswinger outside off, Kamran spars at it and watches it scoot past the outside edge. That should keep the slip fielder interested
Sohail Khan to Kamran Akmal, no run, length and outside off, pushed to point
Sohail Khan to Kamran Akmal, no run, wide of the crease, this length ball, though, largely holds its line outside off. Kamran has a leaden-footed flash and does not connect
Sohail Khan to Kamran Akmal, 1 run, wide of the crease, full and angled in, jammed out towards midwicket via an inside edge

Sohail Khan to Malan, FOUR, here comes Malan. Down the track, frees his arms and nails this very full ball - Malan manufactured the length - up and over the covers. Hit flat and hard. Nearly went all the way

Usman Khan to Kamran Akmal, no run, hip-high short ball outside off, Kamran attempts a pull. Has to settle with an inside edge that trickles behind. Sanga dives full-length to his left to stop that. The 39-year old proves that he still has it, again
Usman Khan to Kamran Akmal, no run, good length and angling away outside off, beats the outside edge
Usman Khan to Kamran Akmal, 2 runs, good length ball on off, Kamran aims a loft. He only flaps it tamely over mid-on
Usman Khan to Kamran Akmal, 1 run, very full on the stumps, bunted to mid-on
Usman Khan to Malan, 1 run, pretty full, tucks 'em up for room. Worked to midwicket
Usman Khan to Kamran Akmal, no run, length ball on off stump, Kamran clears his front leg, has a swing at it but can't beat mid-on to his left
Sohail Khan to Malan, 1 run, picked off the hips square through the leg side
Sohail Khan to Kamran Akmal, 1 run, wide of the crease, angled in short on middle, Kamran short-arms it away to deep square leg. Mis-hit

Sohail Khan to Malan, FOUR, dragged short and outside off, not short enough to trouble Malan. He gets on top of the ball and thumps a pull over midwicket. The man in the deep was too square. He simply watched the ball scoot to the boundary
Sohail Khan to Malan, no run, follows the short one with a full ball on the leg stump. Defended
Sohail Khan to Malan, no run, cheeky little slower one on middle and leg, blocked back to the bowler
Sohail Khan to Malan, no run, banged in short and just outside off, not too much room for Malan. He wildly throws his bat at the ball and only connects with thin air
Usman Khan to Kamran Akmal, FOUR, just clears the outstretched hand of mid-off. Pretty full on off, right in the slot, Kamran clears his front leg and has a go at it. Gets away
Usman Khan to Kamran Akmal, 1 run, follows it with a slower ball on middle and off, Kamran waits for the ball to arrive and then dinks it into the vacant spaces at cover
Usman Khan to Malan, SIX, full and veering into the pads, Malan picks it up and dumps the ball over midwicket. A whirl of the wrists to put that away for a six
Usman Khan to Malan, 1 run, full and outside off, stays in the crease and angles a single down to deep third man

Usman Khan to Kamran Akmal, no run, pitched up and outside off, stroked to the covers. Malan strays out of his crease at the non-striker's end. He aims for a risky single. Kamran isn't interested. A little mix-up but no harm done for Peshwar
Usman Khan to Kamran Akmal, 1 run, hip-high short ball on the leg stump, with fine leg inside the circle that might have disappeared. Usman escapes punishment. Glanced straight to short fine leg
Imad Wasim to Kamran Akmal, 1 run, Karan shows his ace early. Skips out, Imad pushes it wide outside off. Hint of turn. Sliced in the air, does not carry to sweeper cover
Imad Wasim to Malan, 1 leg bye, slides on middle, no turn, Malan attempts a scoop, flicks the pad and runs away fine on the off side
Imad Wasim to Kamran Akmal, no run, pushed through on middle, played back to the bowler
Imad Wasim to Kamran Akmal, 1 run, Kamran backs away outside leg, takes this full one from outside off. Flayed away to deep cover
Imad Wasim to Malan, no run, skids on outside off, driven with a slicing finish. Babar at extra cover throws himself to his left and stops the ball
Imad Wasim to Malan, 1 run, darted on the leg stump, pushed past Imad's left
Usama Mir to Malan, 1 run, low full-toss on middle and leg, whipped away to deep midwicket
Usama Mir to Kamran Akmal, 1 run, fractionally short and outside off, chopped to cover
Usama Mir to Malan, 1 run, non-turning ball on the leg stump, shovelled away to deep square leg
Usama Mir to Kamran Akmal, no run, shortish and outside off, slashes a cut to point
Usama Mir to Kamran Akmal, SIX, fetch that! Kamran gallops down the track, does not get close to the pitch. But the forearms generate all the power. Launched straight over the bowler's head
Usama Mir to Kamran Akmal, SIX, full-toss outside off, Kamran, having stepped away outside leg, tonks it over the covers for back-to-back sixes
Imad Wasim to Malan, 1 run, Malan uses his feet, down the track and forces a short ball to long-off
Imad Wasim to Kamran Akmal, 1 run, flat and outside off, Kamran steps away outside leg and biffs it to sweeper cover
Imad Wasim to Malan, 1 run, fuller and faster on the leg stump, Malan ventures outside leg stump and hits it down to long-off
Imad Wasim to Kamran Akmal, SIX, Imad errs in length. Dishes out a middle-stump full-toss. Kamran crouches and feasts on it. The ball disappears over long-on
Imad Wasim to Kamran Akmal, 1 run, hurled on middle, backs away and chops to cover
Imad Wasim to Malan, 1 run, shortish and sliding across the left-hander. Forced down the ground to long-off
Bopara to Malan, 1 run, floated full and outside off, driven hard to long-on
Bopara to Kamran Akmal, 1 run, short on off, keeps low, pulled off the knee towards deep midwicket. He did well to connect with the ball
Bopara to Malan, 1 run, slower length ball on off, stroked to long-off
Bopara to Kamran Akmal, FOUR, slightly short on middle, another slower ball. Kamran picked the length up really early. Skipping back and crunching a pull to the right of deep midwicket
Bopara to Kamran Akmal, no run, short on middle and leg, miscues a pull towards short fine leg

Bopara to Kamran Akmal, FOUR, 98ks short ball on the off stump, Kamran unleashes another pull. Deep midwicket stumbles and gifts a boundary. 33-ball fifty for Kamran. The drink should taste sweeter for him. Time-out
Mohammad Amir to Malan, no run, good length and holds its line outside off. Malan misjudges the length. Cuts and misses
Mohammad Amir to Malan, 1 run, short and outside off, Malan sits back and drags a pull to midwicket
Mohammad Amir to Kamran Akmal, 1 run, 142.1ks searing yorker on the leg stump, Kamran, having moved away outside leg, jams it out to cover
Mohammad Amir to Malan, 1 run, very full on middle, opens the face and drives towards deep point

Mohammad Amir to Kamran Akmal, 2 runs, slower short ball on the leg stump, Kamran flits around in the crease. Plays early as the ball dribbles to point via an inside edge. The fielder hits the stumps. Kamran and Malan pinch another via a ricochet. The TV umpire checks for a run-out chance, but Malan is in
Mohammad Amir to Kamran Akmal, 1 run, picked up and flicked to long leg
Sohail Khan to Kamran Akmal, no run, cunning slower ball wide outside off, Kamran lets it pass
Sohail Khan to Kamran Akmal, 3 runs, sweeper cover tears across to his left and stops the ball. Slower short ball outside off, carved away

Sohail Khan to Malan, OUT, No century opening stand. Sohail breaks the stand. Azam takes the catch at long-on. Another slower short ball outside off, Malan aims to go downtown with a loft. But the bottom hand flies off the bat, which means he miscues it to Azam
Wicket: ['DJ Malan c Babar Azam b Sohail Khan 36 (31b 4x4 1x6) SR: 116.12']

Commentary: Sohail Khan to Samuels, 1 run, seam-up, short angled in on off, tucks him up for room. Tapped down the ground
Sohail Khan to Kamran Akmal, no run
Sohail Khan to Kamran Akmal, 1 run, chest-high short ball on middle, swivels on the back foot and pulls to long leg
Usama Mir to Kamran Akmal, 1 run, tossed up nicely, driven on the front foot to long-off
Usama Mir to Samuels, 1 run, shorter legbreak, pulled on the back foot to long-on
Usama Mir to Kamran Akmal, SIX, Launched into the second tier. Kamran charges down the track, meets a half-volley and lofts it over long-off. Top shot
Usama Mir to Kamran Akmal, no run, faster and flatter just outside off, slashes and misses
Usama Mir to Kamran Akmal, 1 run, goes low and slog-sweeps a googly to deep midwicket
Usama Mir to Samuels, 2 runs, Samuels presses on for two and gets it. Legbreak. Short and turns away outside off, Samuels goes back and cuts it to the left of sweeper cover
Bopara to Kamran Akmal, 2 runs, full and outside off, Kamran swings and ends up slicing the ball in the air. Drops into no-man's land at sweeper cover
Bopara to Kamran Akmal, 1 leg bye, short slower ball on off, Kamran pulls early and ends up copping a blow on his body
Bopara to Samuels, 1 run, slower short ball on off, drags a pull to deep midwicket
Bopara to Kamran Akmal, 1 run, 103ks short ball outside off, backs away and slaps it to sweeper cover
Bopara to Samuels, 1 run, slower ball, pings the blockhole on off, squirted away for one
Bopara to Kamran Akmal, SIX, pitched up on off, right in the hitting radar. Kamran does not need any second invitations. Clears his front leg and hoists it over Bopara's head for another six
Usman Khan to Samuels, 1 run, possibly a slower ball, comes in, tapped to the off side
Usman Khan to Kamran Akmal, 1 run, very full on off, Kamran clears his front leg and drills it fiercely past the bowler
Usman Khan to Samuels, 1 run, and Samuels tips the strike over to Kamran again. Back of a length and outside off, dabs a cut to deep third man
Usman Khan to Kamran Akmal, no run, wide of the crease, angled in, slower bouncer, beats the hook lavishly. Kamran played early and was duped
Usman Khan to Kamran Akmal, no run, Usman nails a yorker on off, squirted back to the bowler
Usman Khan to Kamran Akmal, 1 run, Kamran pre-meditates by moving across off, flicks a single to long leg. Impressive over - only four runs off it
Bopara to Kamran Akmal, 1 run, short on the leg stump, slower one, swiped away to deep square leg
Bopara to Samuels, FOUR, dug in short and outside off, Samuels brings out the pull, Imad runs to his right, puts in a lazy effort and lets the ball through him to the boundary. Coach Arthur is peeved
Bopara to Samuels, 1 run, slower length ball on off, Samuels hacks at it and inside-edges it onto the pad
Bopara to Kamran Akmal, SIX, slower full ball outside off, Kamran backs away outside leg. Manufactures swinging room and pumps it over long-off
Bopara to Kamran Akmal, SIX, follows the full one with a short ball outside off. Kamran was waiting for it. Nails a pull over square leg
Bopara to Kamran Akmal, 1 run, slower and outside off, flashed to point
Sohail Khan to Kamran Akmal, 1 run, dragged short and outside off. Pulled to deep midwicket
Sohail Khan to Samuels, 1 run, slower outside off, chopped to sweeper cover

Sohail Khan to Kamran Akmal, FOUR, heavy short ball outside off, seam-up, swatted away to the right of Imad at deep midwicket. He slides on his knees and his right foot may have been in contact with the ad board while attempting to flick the ball inside the field of play. Four runs it is. Kamran moves to 98
Sohail Khan to Kamran Akmal, 1 run, dug short and outside off, pulled to deep midwicket. Kamran on 99 now
Sohail Khan to Samuels, SIX, banged in short on middle, Samuels tees off now. He goes back and pummels it beyond the second tier. Dispatched over midwicket
Sohail Khan to Samuels, 2 runs, full ball on off, scythed away to wide long-off

Mohammad Amir to Kamran Akmal, 1 run, that's the first century of this season's PSL and the second overall. Kamran has his hands aloft and acknowledges the crowd. He gets a hug from Samuels. Kamran also pulls off the rock-the-baby celebration à la Sammy. Good length on off, bunted to cover for one
Mohammad Amir to Samuels, 1 run, leg-stump yorker, squeezed to long-on
Mohammad Amir to Kamran Akmal, 1 run, 142.1ks red-hot yorker on the leg stump, inside-edged behind to the keeper. Sanga effects a direct hit. Samuels dishes out a desperate dive and is safe
Mohammad Amir to Samuels, FOUR, back of a length on middle, Samuels swings, and edges it past Sangakkara
Mohammad Amir to Samuels, no run, another ripping yorker, kept out
Mohammad Amir to Samuels, 1 run, shortish on middle, worked to leg
Usman Khan to Samuels, 1 run, right in the blockhole on middle, dug back down the pitch
Usman Khan to Kamran Akmal, no run
Usman Khan to Kamran Akmal, 2 runs, yorker, dug past the bowler again
Usman Khan to Kamran Akmal, 1 run, length ball on off, heaved to deep midwicket
Usman Khan to Samuels, 1 run, off-stump yorker, pushed down to long-on. Excellent death-overs bowling from Usman and Amir
Usman Khan to Kamran Akmal, no run, another yorker on the off stump, squeezed back to the bowler

Mohammad Amir to Samuels, 1 run, OUT, Amir hits the blockhole on middle and leg, dragged away in the direction of deep midwicket. Samuels wants two, Kamran is caught short at the non-striker's end. Amir calmly collects the throw from Bopara and tips the bails off. Kamran is warmly congratulated by the Karachi players
Mohammad Amir to Samuels, FOUR, short on leg stump, Samuels swipes at it and inside-edges it fine past the leg stump
Mohammad Amir to Samuels, 1 run, yorker on leg stump, dug to long-on

Mohammad Amir to Shahid Afridi, OUT, Buh-bye Afridi. The crowd hushed into silence. He bags a golden duck. Full on the stumps, Afridi backs away and attempts a loft. Ends up skewing a catch to long-off
Mohammad Amir to Samuels, 1 run, another fine yorker, which is jabbed to long-off
Mohammad Amir to Sammy, 1 leg bye, full, pitches outside leg, Sammy eyes up a leg-side slog and does not connect. The ball grazes the pad and rolls to cover. They sneak a leg bye
Wicket: ['Shahid Afridi c Babar Azam b Mohammad Amir 0 (1b 0x4 0x6) SR: 0.00']
